_readme: The contents of this file are used to generate CHANGELOG.md; It's kept in JSON/parsable format to make it
possible to generate change-logs in other formats as well (when needed) and to do automatic releases based on
added change-log records. More on how to use it: https://github.com/vaimo/composer-changelogs

fix: make sure that no errors are encountered when plugin gets uninstalled
maintenance: all logic that relied on classes to be in certain depth of directory structure removed

breaking: event sequence changed where nodejs observers are triggered very early to allow other plugins that rely on nodejs to be installed to work correctly
maintenance: introduced static code analysis with compatibility ruleset (to make sure that hte plugin works with php5.3)
